attributes.action: Consider the option that Islam is not a religion of peace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In response to 9/11 and 7/7 we heard politicians repeatedly preach the idea that Islam is not a religion of terror, but instead one of peace and tolerance. 

The overwhelming majority of terrorist attacks conducted globally in recent years have been done by Islamic extremists. 

We call upon the government to consider whether it is more realistic (in terms of problem solving and addressing the issue) to address the issue rather than dismiss it out of hand.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
